conclusion: Area perpendicular to the magnetic field might not be simply L^2.
Consider coil as effectively rotating about its center with adjustment.
Use formula for EMF induced in a coil rotating about an off-center axis.
Visualize coil position with ab side closer to the axis.
Axis is passing through the coil, perpendicular to it.
Distance from center to any side is L/2.
Center is at a distance of L/4 from the axis.
Reconsider axis passing through the center.
